segments.text: This kitchen drawing catches my eye immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink faucet is left on, causing a huge overflow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring out, soaking everything in sight— gross!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying a plate right there, foot in the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's clueless, which is kind of annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinet, kids are raiding the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balancing on a rickety stool— that's reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a sloppy way to get treats, risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl just stands there, begging with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sneaking cookies like that, it's all so undisciplined.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle on the floor is widening, slippery and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the calm garden outside can't hide this indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such avoidable chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
